name: Kernel Panic
short_description: Imagine, that browsing 3D worlds would be as easy as browsing web pages. Or that you could take character modeled and animated by you into your favorite 3D game, invite your friend to your personal 3D reality. Or that... ENOUGH!! Time to make it real!
